assessment_item.title: BV85CC-Q2-The ratio of the velocity of sound in hydrogen gas \\left(y=\\frac{7}{5}\\right) and the velocity of sound in helium gas \\left(y=\\frac{5}{3}\\right)  at the same temperature is

{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

The ratio of the velocity of sound in hydrogen gas \\left(y=\\frac{7}{5}\\right) and the velocity of sound in helium gas \\left(y=\\frac{5}{3}\\right)  at the same temperature is

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

\\sqrt{\\frac{5}{42}}

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:987"},{"text":"

\\sqrt{\\frac{42}{5}}

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:988"},{"text":"

\\frac{\\sqrt{42}}{5}

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:998"},{"text":"

\\frac{5}{\\sqrt{42}}
